numbered_ace_sentences: 2. In all four recorded sports, most coaches are not people of color.
3. In all recorded sports except Baseball, most players are people of color.
4. I wonder about the cause of the ratio between the percentage of coaches of color and the percentage of players of color.
5. I also wonder how diverse the races are among people of color.
6. I ask whether all people of color are of the same race.
7. This situation has a negative impact on my community.
8. This situation also has a negative impact on society.
9. There is a lack of diversity among head coaches.
10. The lack of diversity among head coaches discourages young people of color.
11. These young people pursue a passion to become head coaches.
12. These young people have no idol.
13. These young people can relate to an idol.
14. My title is "Diversity In Professional Sports: Players vs. Coaches".
15. This title captures the main idea of the graph.
16. The purpose of the graph is to show diversity among players and coaches in various professional sports leagues.
